page.title: 07Employment
page.content: We have collected information about {employment}of the parents of children in Ombersley School. Class two took home questionaires for our parents to fill in. The questions were about where they work, what sort of work they do, how many hours they work in a week, how long they have been in that job, and how many people live in the house. The information was brought back to Ombersley School and put on a data base to collate it. We found that a third of the people{work in {Droitwich.}In the families surveyed one third of the people worked. The average{hours worked}were 45 per week, the average length of employment being 9 years. The most common jobs are teachers and landworkers but the employment was pretty varied.
